farFrom.en: The movie was far from boring.
His explanation was far from clear.
The weather is far from perfect today.
The test was far from easy.
The problem is far from simple.
The room is far from clean.
The result was far from good.
Her voice was far from loud.
The soup is far from hot.
The story was far from true.
The answer is far from correct.
The road was far from safe.
My house is far from the school.

howLong.en: How long is your summer vacation?
How long do I have to wait?

iWanna.en: I wanna go home.
I wanna go on a trip.
I wanna quit my job.
I wanna eat something sweet.
I wanna watch a movie tonight.
I wanna take a nap.
I wanna buy a new cell phone.
I wanna talk to you.
I wanna try that new restaurant.
I wanna travel next month.

iWanna.ko: 이 프로젝트 너랑 같이 하고 싶어.
iWanna.en: I wanna work on this project with you.
I don't wanna go to work today.
I don't wanna go back.
I don't wanna talk about it.
I don't wanna eat anything right now.
I don't wanna argue with you.
I don't wanna miss the bus.
I don't wanna go outside.
I don't wanna disappoint you.
I don't wanna do this alone.
I don't wanna waste time.

imGonna.en: I'm gonna ask you some questions.
I'm gonna show you something special.
I'm gonna go to bed early tonight.
I'm gonna be late for the meeting.
I'm gonna start working on the project tomorrow.
I'm gonna ask for help if I need it.
I'm gonna clean my room this weekend.

wouldYouLike.en: Would you like a glass of water?
Would you like to go on?
Would you like to try this new dish?
Would you like some dessert after your meal?
Would you like to watch a movie with me?
Would you like to visit our office next week?

doYouWantTo.en: Do you want to eat snacks?
Do you want to grab a coffee?
Do you want to go for a walk?
Do you want to watch a movie tonight?
Do you want to order some food?
Do you want to take a break?
Do you want to know why?
Do you want to go with me?

doYouHaveAny.en: Do you have any good ideas?
Do you have any time this afternoon?
Do you have any updates on the project?
doYouHaveAny.ko: 그 프로젝트 관련해서 새 소식 있나요?

doYouHaveAny.en: Do you have any messages for her?
Do you have any problem with that?
Do you have any rooms available tonight?
Do you have any bread left?
